channel.title: Shops is a complete fail HELP PLEASE!
channel.description: Hi guys.. I'm using SoulSplit source.. But my problem is i cant sell anything to shops.. How can i fix this?? Please help as soon as possible

item.title: Shops is a complete fail HELP PLEASE!

item.description:

Still doesn’t work…

I remember it’s a certain glitch on SoulSplit… I remember I’ve fixed this before but I can’t remember how.

item.title: Shops is a complete fail HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @matiasmunk matiasmunk
item.description:
@matiasmunk wrote:

[quote=“Logitek, post:2, topic:382943”]dont feel like looking up soulsplit so just tell me if its based off of delta,

if it is, then open shops.cfg (it should be in the cfg/config folder)

and find the shop thats failing

and look at the first 2 numbers that are either 1s or 2s

that controls if you can sell/buy from that shop

change them to the opposite of what they are.[/quote]

It’s Project Insanity… [PI]

Read full topic
item.source: Shops is a complete fail HELP PLEASE!

item.title: Shops is a complete fail HELP PLEASE!
item.dc:creator: @Logitek Logitek
item.description:
@Logitek wrote:

dont feel like looking up soulsplit so just tell me if its based off of delta,

if it is, then open shops.cfg (it should be in the cfg/config folder)

and find the shop thats failing

and look at the first 2 numbers that are either 1s or 2s

that controls if you can sell/buy from that shop

change them to the opposite of what they are.
